gameobjects

Interface GameObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Shooter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEnemyShip, AbstractGameObject, AbstractShip, Bullet, FollowerEnemyShip, PlayerShip, ShooterEnemyShip

    public interface GameObject
    This interface defines many of any game object methods. It's an interface first and not an abstract class so we can create subinterfaces with different functions like Shooter. So if an object is references as Shooter it would still have access to these methods.

      • makeDead

        void makeDead()
        This method makes the object dead. It's called when a situation calls for immediate death.
